_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:43:33 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of adults with learning disabilities in paid employment changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of adults with learning disabilities who are in paid employment has increased. Since in 2008/09, data were only collected for half a year so it is more realistic to look at the change from 2009/10, which was 6.4%, to 2011/12, which was 7.2%; an increase of 0.8%.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Adult Social Care - Combined Activity Return (ASC-CAR)
